item.title: Datadog, Serverless and AWS Lambda: "datadog:handler not initialized" issue
item.description: In this post I’ll describe how to fix the datadog:handler not initialized issue, which may happen to you if you’re using the datadog-lambda-js library in a project deployed in a lambda which already has the Datadog Lambda layer. The fix described here applies to projects using Serverless with the serverless-webpack plugin. Nevertheless, if you’re not using these tools, but you’re having this issue anyway, the solution described here may also be useful for you since the way to fix it is probably very similar.
